#summary overview of the Chassis architecture

= Core Services =

== StudyManagementService - Management of Metadata for Fine-Grained Research Activities (Studies) ==

This service supports the storage, update, retrieval, deletion and query of arbitrary metadata for fine-grained research activities, i.e., minor divisions of research activity within a data sharing network, typically known as studies. 

Protocol/API specification: [StudyManagementServiceAPI]

Implementation: StudyManagementServiceImpl
